document.docAuthor: Zaragoza-Caballero, Santiago, Rodríguez-Mirón, Geovanni M., Vega-Badillo, Viridiana, González-Ramírez, Mireya, Zurita-García, Martín L., Domínguez-León, Daniel E., López-Pérez, Sara, Gutiérrez-Carranza, Ishwari G., Cifuentes-Ruiz, Paulina, Pérez-Hernández, Cisteil X., Valle, Enya Ramírez Del & Gutiérrez, Nayeli
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the Coleoptera (Insecta) from Morelos, Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the Coleoptera (Insecta) from Morelos, Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:

Noguera et al. 2002
